title: Association between albumin-bilirubin score and in-hospital mortality in patients with sepsis: Evidence from two large databases
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Erya Gou, Qilin Yang, Jieru Chen, Tianyu Kong, Zhiwei Tang, Qirui Wen, Wenxing Huang, Guangqian Yang, Wenling Li, Deliang Wen, Zhenhui Zhang
